welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Frechen, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Cologne/bonn Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves Eurowings and other low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and non-Star Alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
